content: okay so there is a headband/ear-warmer that is really cute but it retails at a price that is way out of my budget at almost $100 if you are in the same budget category as me let s knit one instead **size ** 4 5 /11 5 cm wide and 17 19 21 /43 48 5 53 5 cm long to fit 18 20 22 /46 51 56 cm head circumference **materials ** loops & thread cozy wool 50% wool/50% acrylic 90 yds/80m per 4 5 oz/127g skein super bulky yarn 1 skein the larges sizes uses approx 52 yds/48 m 1 set of us #13 9 mm needles spare dpn or large cable needle or spare circular needle tapestry needle **gauge ** 9 sts & 12 row= 4 inches in stockinette stitch *gauge is not critically important if you work the cowl in a less bulky yarn it will not be as wide just work additional row to get the necessary length *
